div.bibl: The Sentinel, Volumes 1 & 2, Week of May 19, 1911; Page 2.

body.p: The Madeline Mayer House, the new building erected for the Helen Day Nursery by Mrs. Levy Mayer, was formally opened on May 14. It is located at Union and Barber Streets.
The purpose of the house, will be to provide shelter and protection to children during the mother's working hours. It will also be an industrial, educational, and social center for mothers.
